Title: Ganja seized, three held in Pinagadi
Content: The City Task Force (CTF) on Wednesday conducted raid near Bamboo Restaurant at Pinagadi under Pendurthi Police Station limits, and apprehended three persons Noorul Siddik of Jammadevipeta, N. Ramesh
Author: Special Correspondent
Description: The City Task Force (CTF) on Wednesday conducted raid near Bamboo Restaurant at Pinagadi under Pendurthi Police Station limits, and apprehended three persons Noorul Siddik of Jammadevipeta, N. Ramesh
